message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's start with a price of $1400000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1300000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1300000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1350000. I believe this is a fair price that balances our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1325000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1325000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to meet a minimum threshold to make this deal worthwhile. I'm counteroffering at $1375000. This is my final concession, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1350000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not getting closer to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be confident that we're at a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1375000 again, but this time I'm willing to throw in some additional perks and support to sweeten the deal. I'm hoping this will be the final concession I need to make.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Considering the additional perks and support, I would like to propose a price of $1360000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than I already have, Bob. I've made significant concessions and added value to the deal with the perks and support. I'm afraid I need to prioritize my own interests and the minimum price I need to make this deal worthwhile. I'm counteroffering at $1375000 one last time. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1365000 for the product.
